mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Board( board_no, board_title, board_content, member_id, member_name, last_update ) VALUES ( #{boardNo}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, #{memberId}, #{memberName}, now() )
mapper.select: SELECT board_no as boardNo, board_title as boardTitle, board_content as boardContent, member_id as memberId, member_name as memberName, last_update as lastUpdate FROM board ORDER BY last_update DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}

SELECT board_no as boardNo, board_title as boardTitle, board_content as boardContent, member_id as memberId, member_name as memberName, last_update as lastUpdate FROM board WHERE board_no = #{boardNo}
